metadata.description: The Capitalist Pigs is a VIP network of entrepreneurs and investors, connected by an NFT. We are a community first, and we are an NFT second; as a community, we share private deal flow, organize meetups, and share resources to create opportunities to build wealth. Your Capitalist Pig NFT is your access to the community, to all events and meetups, and priority to all VIP opportunities and experiences reserved for the network.
